meanings.sent1: He motorcycled to work every day.
meanings.sent2: She motorcycled through the winding roads of the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The cat pretended to motorcycled on its toy motorcycle.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts motorcycled through memories of her adventurous road trips.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the engine echoed as he motorcycled into the sunset.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he motorcycled to the beach and had a great time.
meanings.sent2: She motorcycled across the country last summer.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel accidentally motorcycled into a pile of leaves.
meanings.sent4: His mind motorcycled back to the thrilling race he had won.
meanings.sent5: The memories of the road trip he motorcycled on flooded back to him.
